Alpha Fastapi Core Plugins's documentation!
================================================


Project help
============
   This Project help you to build microservice with fastapi with these futures.
   You can use sample project to build your own services.


.. important::

   This Project based on mongodb and rabbitmq , if you wanna use another database or message broker you can add like Plugins to this project.


Plugins
=======

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   core
